FINANCIAL_SENTIMENT.prompt: Analyze financial sentiment for {{TICKER}} from news sources. Score -100 to 100: 1) Earnings outlook 2) Analyst consensus 3) Debt/capital position. Return EXACTLY: {"earnings_score": <int>, "analyst_score": <int>, "debt_score": <int>}
FINANCIAL_SENTIMENT.search: "{{TICKER}} stock" earnings OR analyst OR debt OR refinancing OR capital

REGULATORY_RISK.prompt: Assess regulatory exposure for {{TICKER}}. Score 0-100: 1) Antitrust risk 2) FDA/health impact 3) Environmental liability. Return EXACTLY: {"antitrust_risk": <int>, "fda_risk": <int>, "environmental_risk": <int>}
REGULATORY_RISK.search: "{{TICKER}} stock" regulation OR lawsuit OR antitrust OR fda OR environmental

WSB_SENTIMENT.prompt: Gauge WallStreetBets sentiment for {{TICKER}}. Score -100 (panic) to 100 (meme frenzy): 1) YOLO calls 2) Short squeeze buzz 3) Diamond hands mentions. Return EXACTLY: {"yolo_score": <int>, "squeeze_score": <int>, "diamond_hands_score": <int>}

TECHNICAL_DISCUSSION.prompt: Analyze technical sentiment for {{TICKER}}. Score -100 (bearish) to 100 (bullish): 1) RSI signals 2) Volume anomalies 3) Options flow. Return EXACTLY: {"rsi_score": <int>, "volume_score": <int>, "options_flow_score": <int>}
TECHNICAL_DISCUSSION.search: "{{TICKER}} stock" technical analysis OR RSI OR options flow OR volume spike

RETAIL_SENTIMENT.prompt: Measure retail trader sentiment for {{TICKER}}. Score -100 (panic) to 100 (FOMO): 1) Platform trends 2) Discussion sentiment 3) Holding patterns. Return EXACTLY: {"platform_score": <int>, "discussion_score": <int>, "holding_score": <int>}
RETAIL_SENTIMENT.search: "{{TICKER}} stock" robinhood OR webull OR retail trader OR holding pattern

INDUSTRY_TRENDS.prompt: Evaluate industry impact on {{TICKER}}. Score -100 (negative) to 100 (positive): 1) Innovation leadership 2) Supply chain health 3) Competitive threats. Return EXACTLY: {"innovation_score": <int>, "supply_chain_score": <int>, "competition_score": <int>}
INDUSTRY_TRENDS.search: "{{TICKER}} stock" innovation OR "supply chain" OR competition OR disruption

INSTITUTIONAL_SENTIMENT.prompt: Assess institutional positioning for {{TICKER}}. Score -100 (short-heavy) to 100 (long conviction): 1) Short interest changes 2) Insider activity 3) Hedge fund moves. Return EXACTLY: {"short_interest_score": <int>, "insider_score": <int>, "hedge_fund_score": <int>}
INSTITUTIONAL_SENTIMENT.search: "{{TICKER}} stock" "short interest" OR insider OR "hedge fund"

EXECUTIVE_IMPACT.prompt: Evaluate leadership impact for {{TICKER}}. Score -100 (negative) to 100 (positive): 1) Earnings call tone 2) Strategic announcements 3) Executive changes. Return EXACTLY: {"call_tone_score": <int>, "strategy_score": <int>, "executive_score": <int>}
EXECUTIVE_IMPACT.search: "{{TICKER}} stock" CEO OR CFO OR executive OR leadership

ESG_RISKS.prompt: Assess ESG risks for {{TICKER}}. Score 0-100 severity: 1) Carbon exposure 2) ESG downgrades 3) Sustainability gap. Return EXACTLY: {"carbon_risk": <int>, "esg_risk": <int>, "sustainability_risk": <int>}
ESG_RISKS.search: "{{TICKER}} stock" ESG OR carbon OR sustainability OR environmental

SOCIAL_MEDIA_BUZZ.prompt: Measure general social media buzz for {{TICKER}}. Score -100 (negative) to 100 (positive): 1) Twitter sentiment 2) StockTwits momentum 3) Reddit mentions. Return EXACTLY: {"twitter_score": <int>, "stocktwits_score": <int>, "reddit_score": <int>}
SOCIAL_MEDIA_BUZZ.search: "{{TICKER}} stock" twitter OR stocktwits OR reddit
